Bart Cassidy.name: Bart Cassidy
Bart Cassidy.ability: Each time he loses a life point, he immediately draws a card from the deck.

Black Jack.name: Black Jack
Black Jack.ability: When drawing to start his turn, he must show the second card he draws. If it's a Heart or Diamond, he draws one additional card (without revealing it).

Calamity Janet.name: Calamity Janet
Calamity Janet.ability: She can use BANG! cards as Missed! cards and vice versa.

El Gringo.name: El Gringo
El Gringo.ability: Each time he loses a life point due to a card played by another player, he draws a random card from the hand of that player (one card for each life point).

Jesse Jones.name: Jesse Jones
Jesse Jones.ability: When drawing to start his turn, he may choose to draw the first card randomly from the hand of another player instead of from the deck.

Jourdonnais.name: Jourdonnais
Jourdonnais.ability: He is considered to have a Barrel in play at all times. If he has another real Barrel card in play, he can count both of them.

Kit Carlson.name: Kit Carlson
Kit Carlson.ability: When drawing to start his turn, he looks at the top 3 cards of the deck, choosing 2 and placing the third back on top of the deck face-down.

Lucky Duke.name: Lucky Duke
Lucky Duke.ability: Each time he's required to 'draw!', he flips the top 2 cards from the deck and chooses the one he prefers. He discards both afterwards.

Paul Regret.name: Paul Regret
Paul Regret.ability: He is considered to have a Mustang in play at all times. If he has another real Mustang card in play, he can count both of them.

Pedro Ramirez.name: Pedro Ramirez
Pedro Ramirez.ability: When drawing to start his turn, he may choose to draw his first card from the top of the discard pile instead of the deck.

Rose Doolan.name: Rose Doolan
Rose Doolan.ability: She is considered to have a Scope in play at all times. If she has another real Scope card in play, she can count both of them.

Sid Ketchum.name: Sid Ketchum
Sid Ketchum.ability: At any time, he may discard 2 cards from his hand to regain one life point. He can use this ability more than once at a time if he chooses.

Slab The Killer.name: Slab The Killer
Slab The Killer.ability: Players trying to cancel his BANG! cards need 2 Missed! cards to do so. Barrel, if successfully used, only counts as one.

Suzy Lafayette.name: Suzy Lafayette
Suzy Lafayette.ability: As soon as she has no cards in her hand, she draws a card from the draw pile.

Vulture Sam.name: Vulture Sam
Vulture Sam.ability: Whenever a character is eliminated, Sam takes all the cards that that player had in his hand and in play, and adds them to his own hand.

Willy The Kid.name: Willy The Kid
Willy The Kid.ability: He can play any number of BANG! cards during his turn.
